meanings.sent1: I am excited to start at juco next semester.
meanings.sent2: She decided to enroll in juco to save money before transferring to a university.
meanings.sent3: The juco down the street has a great reputation for its sports programs.
meanings.sent4: Attending juco felt like taking a step towards my future.
meanings.sent5: The campus of the juco was bustling with students eager to learn.

meanings.sent1: After high school, he chose to attend juco to explore different career paths.
meanings.sent2: Many students opt for juco to complete their general education requirements.
meanings.sent3: The juco in the neighboring town offers a wide range of courses.
meanings.sent4: Juco provides a supportive environment for students transitioning to higher education.
meanings.sent5: The affordability of juco makes it an attractive option for many learners.

meanings.definition: A student attending a junior college.
meanings.sent1: As a juco, I have access to various resources to help me succeed academically.
meanings.sent2: She met her best friend while studying at juco.
meanings.sent3: The juco organized a fun event for all the students.
meanings.sent4: Being a juco has allowed me to pursue my passion for art.
meanings.sent5: The juco community welcomed me with open arms when I first arrived.
